Yardage + Green Map \/ Yards","public_title":"Yardage + Green Map \/ Yards","options":["Yardage + Green Map","Yards"],"price":4900,"weight":56,"compare_at_price":null,"inventory_management":null,"barcode":null,"featured_media":{"alt":null,"id":34074245136678,"position":4,"preview_image":{"aspect_ratio":1.0,"height":1080,"width":1080,"src":"\/\/puttviewbooks.com\/cdn\/shop\/products\/yardagegreenmap_d262f841-13fd-42b8-9c49-00b154b2372f.jpg?v=1686331470"}},"requires_selling_plan":false,"selling_plan_allocations":[]} Product Description Book size measurement is 6.5"x 3.75" and greens are scaled to no larger than 3/8 inch to 5 yards (USGA conforming). Distance is presented in yards and slope is presented in percentage. They are saddle stitched to fit perfectly inside a traditional yardage book cover. Variant types: Yardage Penalty to penalty width distance Carries and runout distances Compass off tee shot and into green Tee to fairway and fairway to green +/- elevation change To green and from tee distance rings Major Slopes Everything in the yardage book, plus: Detailed thermal green view with contours and arrows in major slope areas (3% and above). Also includes arrows and contours in surrounding areas around green. Fairway arrows that represent slope above 4% Yardage + Green Map Everything in the yardage book, plus: Duel view topographical green map Thermal View - easily see ridges and spot possible hole locations Detailed View - supports green reading with arrows and contours shown at the maximum resolution allowed within the rules of golf Fairway arrows that represent slope above 4% 0 Shipping & Returns Shipping As our books are made to order, shipping times may vary. We appreciate your patience and understanding. Returns ReturnsWe only accept returns for books confirmed by the carrier to be damaged during transit. Please inspect your order upon delivery and contact us within 14 days of the posted delivery date if the item is defective, damaged, or incorrect. Michael M. Verified Reviewer "Have been using these books for awhile and they are the best. Gives you all the information you need on the course and is very simple to read and understand." Brian F The Only Books I Use Puttview books are by far the easiest to understand and use for tournament play. The added lines of play off the tee make practice rounds and taking notes for the tournament super easy. I highlight the line of play I think is best and write what club I will use right on the line. Matthew j. Name * First Last Email * Phone Comment Submit Meet The Team General Manager/ Head Golf Professional Tim Ward, PGA Click to Email Assistant Golf Professional Kevin Reidinger Click to Email Assistant Golf Professional Brandon Wolff Click to Email Assistant Golf Professional Denise Dimino Click to Email Sales & Marketing Manager Amanda Placzankis Click to Email Food & Beverage Manager Tristen Loveland Click to Email Controllers Ron Newsom Robert Goodfellow Click to Email Ron Click to Email Robby Course Superintendent Aaron Smallwood Click to Email Heron Glen Golf Course & Restaurant, one of New Jersey’s finest public golf facilities, is managed by KemperSports , link opens in a new tab, on behalf of The County of Hunterdon. The best-in-class services at Heron Glen Golf course & Restaurant are provided by KemperSports staff members who receive the job benefits of working for a professional golf course and hospitality management company. About KemperSports KemperSports is a golf course and hospitality management company , link opens in a new tab, that provides daily fee golf courses, private clubs, resorts and hospitality venues with proven service strategies to increase guest and member satisfaction. With experienced golf management, operations, marketing and technology solutions, KemperSports has been a leader in the golf and hospitality industry , link opens in a new tab, since 1979, with over 130 venues under management across the United States and Mexico. The company’s award-winning portfolio includes nationally-ranked golf courses, private clubs, municipal golf courses and golf tournament venues such as Bandon Dunes Golf Resort , named the No. 1 Golf Resort in North America by Golf Digest and GOLF Magazine ; Streamsong Resort ; The Glen Club ; Desert Willow Golf Resort ; and Chambers Bay , host of the 2015 U.S. Open . For more information about KemperSports, please visit https://www.kempersports.com/ . Join the KemperSports social media conversation on Facebook , Twitter , Instagram and LinkedIn .
